page.title: 11THE FAIR
page.content: The fair comes to Tackley evry year in the middle of July. It sets up on the Recreation Ground. There is not a great deal at the fair now. Last year there were Swingboats and the Gallopers but two of the people who used to run the fair have died since then so there is not so much this year. A person got killed on the swingboats so that is why they are not here. The best thing is the Satellite which is round and has 20 seats. It costs 30p. and a ride lasts about 5 minutes. There will also be Bumper cars, shooting ranges and hot-dog, candy-floss and toffee-apple stalls. I shall take Â£2.50 to the fair.
